sections.heading: Compensation; joint employers; liability
sections.text: In case any employee for whose injury or death compensation is payable under the Nebraska Workers' Compensation Act shall, at the time of the injury, be employed and paid jointly by two or more employers, as defined in section 48-114, such employers shall con

sections.heading: 48-129 and 48-168, R.R.S.1943, gives the Workmen's Compensation Court jurisdiction to consider the issue of joint employment
sections.text: White v. Western Commodities, Inc., 207 Neb. 75, 295 N.W.2d 704 (1980).
